reviews.text:
Tony and his crew were exceptional to work with. Great attention to detail, transparent, and open as to what they were doing to the roof. Happy to answer any questions we had. Just a really great experience and very happy we went with Tony @ Kings Roofing to turn our vision into reality.

Beyond the quality of their work, they are also quality people and enjoyable to talk with. Thanks again!!

I had a water pipe burst that took out 3 bathrooms and 3 bedrooms. When I called King's Roofing, they were on site assessing the situation quickly. They were able to give me a reasonable quote. When they completed the work, it was on time and the quality of the work was exceptional.  All his contractors ans workers were professional and highly experienced. Tony, the owner, is knowledgeable, experienced, and has excellent problem solving skills. I would recommend this company to anyone with roofi

This was the most seamless roofing experience we have ever experienced.  Tony and his crew were on time, quick and they picked all debris.  Tony is very honest and reasonable.  Thank you sir for a wonderful roof!  Can’t wait for our remodeling job coming up

Update: I also wanted to review a bathroom and bedroom remodel.  Bathroom was tub to shower conversion, but they did so much more.  Tony subcontracted with Albert Fernandez and they did so wonderful with the job.  We will definitely be reach

This is the 3rd roof we have had since around 2000. We have had nothing but excellent experiences with Tony, Alfredo and the crew at Kings Roofing. An over abundance of kindness, compassion and courtesy come with each job done. They go above and beyond what you would expect from a roofing company, taking into consideration the home owners requests as well as adding their ideas and concepts if desired by the owner. They use only the best materials and their warranties are gold. They arrive early

I can't say enough about Kings Roofing! Our roof in Texas got some serious hail damage recently. Tony showed us our shingle color options and availability. They used very high quality materials and upgraded the ventilation in a few places that were much needed with the Texas heat. The crew was on time, finished on schedule and left my property spotless. They did such a great job my next door neighbor ended up using them too!

Tony has done various things for us besides roofing. They updated both our bathrooms and some updates in our kitchen. They did a fantastic job! They were great with providing ideas and types of materials to use. I love my new bathrooms!! Love the new counnter top and backslash Tony picked out and the lighting!
I would only use them for future projects. Thank you Tony!

I highly recommend King’s Roofing for  patio covers!  We hired Tony LaRusso and his team last summer and they did a fantastic job installing a patio cover for us.  This team provides quality workmanship and integrity at a good value!  Would definitely hire him again!

Kings roofing provided a positive and professional experience for our roofing needs. They communicated well throughout the process, did great work, were  punctual, FAST, and kept a very clean work area! I highly recommend kings roofing!

Kings Roofing Replaced the roof at 1794 CR 2270 iin Mineola and also repaired and replaced some rotted wood on my rental property.  We love the color that he chose.  The company was quick to respond to our request and the crew did a clean job. We had a Hot summer day that day and they finished after just two days. We will have him come back to our home soon.

I would highly recommend King's roofing. They provide awesome and honest work that is top notch!!! Tony has integrity and is trust worthy.

Give them a call for all your roofing needs today!!!

We have used King Roofs for 3 roofs over a 36 year period . We have also had them do 5 or 6 interior projects including complete bathroom makeovers , removal of slider doors and lots of painting. We have never had an issue that Tony didn’t fix. Always shows up on time and always with a smile!

King’s Roofing has done multiple roofs for me over the years. Also, interior paint and carpentry work.
I would not recommend another company except King’s Roofing.
Don’t get ripped off or stuck with inferior work.!

I give King’s Roofing 5 stars!!
Kings roofing was very professional and on time. They gave me a very reasonable quote on my roof and gutters. I will definitely use them in the near future. I will recommend them to all my friends.

These guys are amazing. Tony was so
nice, as well as his crew. They showed up the day they were supposed to and worked hard all day. You could tell that they knew what they were doing. Tony was great about working with my insurance company and I would definitely hire them again.

Tony was recommended to me through a friend and we are glad we called him. He came out and gave us an estimate on a fence (not just a roofer) and the first thing he told me was I was not responsible for the fence repairs, the neighbors were. He drove all the way from Arlington and cared more about me, then making money. I have known Tony over 20 years. His company is top notch. He is a man of his Word. They do great work. Very trustworthy!
I have known Tony Larussa for many years. I know Tony as a man of integrity. He is dedicated to putting forth the best product and value for his customers!

We had Tony replace our roof ,  the service & quality is top notch .
Trust me ,  don’t bother calling anyone else .  Just call Kings Roofing

I‘be used this company in a residential capacity as well as for a commercial business and have been totally pleased with the quality of their work and the professionalism of the staff. You will be pleased if you select this company to meet your needs.
Can’t say enough good about these guys! Excellent, thorough, informative, responsive- simply the best. And as a single woman, having ANY contractor you can actually count on is rare!
Multiple roofs replaced on several homes, exceptional work on every one.
One of our best friends owns this company.  They take care of my roof.
Great company to work with. Very responsive to our needs and questions. Highly recommend.
